![](Image_Taxes.jpeg?t=202508071605220)
[### 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate and FY 2025-2026 City Budget](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

08-07-2025
By Resolution 2025-06-R, August 6, 2025, City Council approved a Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000. This rate is the same tax rate as 2024.
[Ordinance 2025-18\_Adopted 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-18_ORDINANCE_Adopted%202025%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate.pdf?t=202509121505070)
[Ordinance 2025-17\_Adopted FY 2025-2026 City Budget](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-17_ORDINANCE_Adopted%20FY%202025-2026%20City%20Budget%20(signed).pdf?t=202509121512400)
[Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Notice%20of%20Public%20Hearing%20on%20Tax%20Increase.pdf?t=202508191722080)
[PUBLIC HEARING NOTICE\_2025-2026 Proposed Budget & Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/PUBLIC%20HEARING%20NOTICE_2025-2026%20Proposed%20Budget%20&%20Tax%20Rate.pdf?t=202509051626510)
[R
ESOLUTION 2025-06-R\_Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-06-R_RESOLUTION_2025%20Proposed%20Tax%20Rate%20of%20$0.495000%20per%20$100%20valuation%20(signed).pdf?t=202508071612140)
[Notice of 2025 Calculated Tax Rates](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Notice%20of%202025%20Calculated%20Tax%20Rates.pdf?t=202508071604150)
**[Adopted Fiscal Year 2025-2026 Budget](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Adopted%20Fiscal%20Year%202025-2026%20Budget.pdf?t=202509161711590)**

![](Image_Vote.jpg?t=202507241421350)
[### \*\*CANCELED\*\* November 4, 2025 Special Election](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

07-24-2025
Shall the San Antonio Metropolitan Transit Authority be continued in the City of Saint Hedwig?
(Conditional upon a Majority Vote of "NO" on Proposition A) The adoption of a sales and use tax at the rate of two percent (2%) in the City of Saint Hedwig
[2025-20\_ORDINANCE\_Cancelling the November 4, 2025 Special Election](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-20_ORDINANCE_Cancelling%20the%20November%204,%202025%20Special%20Election.pdf?t=202510031525370)
[Order of 11-4-25 Special Election (Proposition A)](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Order%20of%2011-4-25%20Special%20Election%20(Proposition%20A).pdf?t=202507241423430)
[Order of 11-4-25 Special Election (Proposition B)](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Order%20of%2011-4-25%20Special%20Election%20(Proposition%20B).pdf?t=202507241430320)
[Ordinance 2025-13\_Ordering Special Election (VIA)](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-13_ORDINANCE_Ordering%20Nov%204,%202025%20Special%20Election%20(should%20VIA%20service%20continue%20in%20St%20Hedwig)%20(signed).pdf?t=202507241432040)
[Ordinance 2025-14\_Ordering Special Election (Sales Tax Increase)](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-14_ORDINANCE_Ordering%20Nov%204,%202025%20Special%20Election%20(Sales%20Tax)%20(signed).pdf?t=202507241433010)

![](bexar county app.jpg?t=202504301740220)
[### Bexar Appraisal District 2025 Notices of Appraised Value](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

**On April 11, 2025, the Bexar Appraisal District (BCAD) mailed the 2025 Notices of Appraised**
**$1,000 or more compared to the previous year. Property owners have until May 15, 2025,**
**or 30 days after receiving their notice to appeal their appraised value.**

Appeals can be submitted in person, by mail, or online using the Online Services Portal at
[www.bcad.org](https://www.bcad.org)
.

For assistance with filing an appeal or for more information, contact BCAD at 210-242-2432 or
[**https://help.bcad.org**](https://help.bcad.org/)






![](Image_Vote.jpg?t=202507241421350)
[### CANCELATION OF MAY 3, 2025 GENERAL ELECTION](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
**SAINT HEDWIG'S MAY 3, 2025 GENERAL ELECTION IS CANCELED. THE FOLLOWING CANDIDATES HAVE BEEN CERTIFIED AS UNOPPOSED AND ARE HEREBY ELECTED AS FOLLOWS:
City Council Place 1 - Dwayne Padalecki, Incumbent, Unopposed
City Council Place 3 - Caid Frankowiak, Incumbent, Unopposed
City Council Place 5 - John E. Hafner, Incumbent, Unopposed
[RESOLUTION 2025-03-R\_ORDER OF CANCELATION](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-03-R_RESOLUTION_Cancellation%20of%20May%203,%202025%20Election%20(signed).pdf?t=202505021311360)**




![](generator.jpg?t=202503051342040)
[### Purchase and Installation of a stand by Generator Bidding Information](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
The City of Saint Hedwig Texas is soliciting Request For Proposal (RFP) for purchase and installation of a 60 KW Diesel stand by Generator.
The city will be using a Competitive Sealed Proposal (CSP) bid process.
The Contract will be awarded based on BEST VALUE between the City and the top-ranked contractor.
The project includes the purchasing, and complete installation of a 60 kw diesel generator
**[Project Package](https://sainthedwigcity.com/City%20of%20Saint%20Hedwig-RFP.pdf?t=202503051343220)**
**Due March 28, 2025 at 3:00 pm
For more information contact the City Manager
210-667-9568**

![](sign - Copy.jpg?t=202502111649210)
[### Truck Route Ordinance 2025-04](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

**THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS. ORDINANCE NO. 2025-04. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS, REGULATING TRUCK TRAFFIC ON PUBLIC STREETS DESIGNATED AS NO THROUGH TRUCK STREETS; PROVIDING FOR INSTALLATION OF SIGNS; PROVIDING FOR PENALTIES; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABLITY; AND PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE.**
Any person who violates any provision of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction, shall be fined not more than five hundred ($500.00) dollars. Any law enforcement officer is hereby authorized to issue a citation for violations of this article. To see complete ordinance, visit the City of Saint Hedwig website, sainthedwigcity.com.
**PASSED AND APPROVED the 5th day of February, 2025.**
[VIEW ORDINANCE 2025-04](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-04_ORDINANCE_Truck%20Route%20(signed).pdf?t=202502261638380)
**[Truck Route Map](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Truck%20Route%20Saint%20Hedwig%20(002).pdf?t=202502121409050)**

[### Future Land Use Plan Update Open House](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

**Help Envision Saint Hedwig’s Future**

**January 23**

The City of Saint Hedwig is nearing the end of the process to update the Future Land Use Plan element of the City’s Master Plan.
An open house will be held at City Hall to present the proposed amendments to the Future Land Use Plan & Map and gather feedback from citizens.

**January 23
, 2025, from 6-8pm, at**
**City Hall - 13065 FM 1346.**

Citizens are invited to attend this meeting and encouraged to participate in the sharing of ideas about the future of Saint Hedwig.

*more information contact
City Hall at (210) 667-9568*
[NOTICE OF POSSIBLE QUORUM](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-01-23%20FLU%20Open%20House_Notice%20of%20Possible%20Quorum.pdf?t=202501171608210)

**Saint Hedwig City Hall**
**13065 FM 1346**

Congressman Henry Cuellar's Office
and Alamo Area Council of Governments(AACOG)

![](Image_Taxes.jpeg?t=202508071605220)
[### Budget & Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERTATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY -0.12 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $0.00
[Adopted 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate\_Ordinance 2024-11](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024-11_ORDINANCE_Adopted%202024%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate%20(signed).pdf?t=202410291111000)
[Adopted FY 2024-2025 City Budget\_Ordinance 2024-10](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024-10_ORDINANCE_Adopted%20FY%202024-2025%20City%20Budget%20(singed).pdf?t=202410291109120)
[9/12/24 Public Hearing Notice (Proposed Budget & Tax Rate)](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Public%20Hearing%20Notice%20(Prposed%20Budget%20&%20Tax%20Rate).pdf?t=202408201137220)
[Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Notice%20of%20Public%20Hearing%20on%20Tax%20Increase.pdf?t=202508191722080)
[Proposed FY 2024-2025 City Budget](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Proposed%20Budget%20FY%202024-2025.pdf?t=202408131700510)
[Proposed 2024 Tax Rate\_Resolution 2024-08-R](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024-08-R_RESOLUTION_2024%20Proposed%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate%20(signed)%20WITH%20CORRECTED%20VOTER%20APPROVAL%20RATE.pdf?t=202408091619410)
[2024 Tax Rate Notice](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024%20Tax%20Rate%20Notice_WITH%20CORRECTED%20VOTER%20APPROVAL%20RATE.pdf?t=202408091618570)

[###](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
Applications for appointment to the City's Board of Adjustment are currently being accepted.
Deadline to apply has been extended to November 27, 2024, 5:00 p.m.
If you wish to apply, submit the application below to:
**City Manager Maria Hernandez**
**citymanager@sainthedwigcity.com
[BOA APPLICATION](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024%20CITY%20OF%20SAINT%20HEDWIG%20BOA%20APPLICATION.pdf?t=202410291348550)**






![](Image_plans.jpg?t=202502251103280)
[### Annex Renovation Bidding information](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
The City of Saint Hedwig ("Owner") proposes to renovate the existing
City Hall Annex Building at 13035 FM 1346, Saint Hedwig, TX 78152,
using a Competitive Sealed Proposal (CSP) bid process
[Project Package](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Saint%20Hedwig%20City%20Hall%20Annex%20Renovation%20SPECS%2010-08-24r1.pdf?t=202410181210540)
[Drawings](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Saint%20Hedwig%20City%20Hall%20Annex%20Renovation%20DRAWINGS%2010-08-24r1.pdf?t=202410181212150)
**Due Date has changed to Friday, November 8th**
Proposals are due November 8, 2024 by 3:00 PM

[### Fall Cleanup Day](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

07-31-2024
**Saturday, October 12**
**[FLYER](https://sainthedwigcity.com/FLYER_CLEAN%20UP%20DAY%20(FALL)_10-12-24.pdf?t=202407311722210)**






[### Am I a Resident of the City of Saint Hedwig?](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
If you have a Saint Hedwig address,
click link below to determine if you are a:
1. Resident of the City of Saint Hedwig, residing inside the city limits
2. Non-resident, residing outside the city limits, within the City's ETJ (extraterritorial jurisdiction)
[CLICK HERE](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Are%20You%20a%20Resident%20of%20Saint%20Hedwig.pdf?t=202407121316340)






![](Image_Burn Ban_fire.png?t=202502251109010)
[### Outdoor Burning](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

#### OUTDOOR BURNING WITHIN THE SAINT HEDWIG CITY LIMITS

Outdoor burning is allowed within the Saint Hedwig city limits per Ordinance 2022-27.
No permit is required, but residents are required to follow Bexar County burning regulations
as posted on the
[Bexar County Fire Marshal website](https://www.bexar.org/630/Fire-Marshal)
[Ordinance 2022-27](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2022-27_ORDINANCE_Outdoor%20Burning%20Regulations%20.pdf?t=202301111632330)




[### Mayor Dee Grimm](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)
[Mayor's Message](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Mayors%20Message.pdf?t=202405201237340)

![](_assets_/images/news-2.jpg)
[### Truck Route Ordinance 2025-04](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

**THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS. ORDINANCE NO. 2025-04. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS, REGULATING TRUCK TRAFFIC ON PUBLIC STREETS DESIGNATED AS NO THROUGH TRUCK STREETS; PROVIDING FOR INSTALLATION OF SIGNS; PROVIDING FOR PENALTIES; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABLITY; AND PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE.**
Any person who violates any provision of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction, shall be fined not more than five hundred ($500.00) dollars. Any law enforcement officer is hereby authorized to issue a citation for violations of this article.
**PASSED AND APPROVED the 5th day of February, 2025.
[Click here to read entire Ordinance 2025-04](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-04_ORDINANCE_Truck%20Route%20(signed).pdf?t=202502261638380)**

[### STAR PARTY](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

OBSERVE THE NIGHT SKY AND LEARN ABOUT CONSTELLATIONS AND THE PLANETS!
Presented by the San Antonio Astronomical Association
And The City of Saint Hedwig

Take turns looking through telescopes brought by local astronomers and see the Constellations and Jupiter.
To find out what will be in the sky on Saturday March 2, 2024 click below
<https://nightsky.jpl.nasa.gov/event-view.cfm?Event_ID=137737>
Please bring a Red-Light Flashlight
BYOC- Bring your own chair
Dress for the weather

March 2, 2024
6:30 to 8:30 PM
Saint Hedwig City Park
13065 FM 1346
**For more information call City Hall  210-667-9568**






![](Image_Detour Sign.jpg?t=202502251109290)
[### Road Closed to Thru Traffic](https://sainthedwigcity.com/#)

The City of Saint Hedwig is going to be Repairing a Culvert on N. Graytown Rd
Between Mihlski Ln and N. Lupon
And will be closing the street for traffic beginning
Monday, January 8th, 2024.
Please follow the detour map if traveling on this area
If you have any questions call City Hall 210-667-9568

Thank you
[Detour Map](https://sainthedwigcity.com/11-22-23_Graytown%20Rd.%20-%20Detour%20Exhibit.pdf?t=202312151236350)
